video.title: The Garfield Show
video.synopsis: Lazy, lasagna-loving fat cat Garfield lives life on his own terms, which includes teasing his geeky owner, Jon, and tormenting dimwitted dog Odie.

episodes.synopsis: There is a space invasion and the aliens look like Garfield's favorite meal: lasagna. / A bluebird is locked in a garage. Who will care for her eggs?
episodes.title: Pasta Wars / Mother Garfield

episodes.synopsis: Garfield goes trick-or-treating as a scary Catzilla. But the real Catzilla has just escaped from the zoo. / Odie switches brains with Garfield.
episodes.title: Orange and Black / Freaky Monday

episodes.synopsis: Garfield thinks Odie found a dinosaur bone, so he goes to the museum. / A salesman has sold Jon a cleaning robot, which is annoying his two pets.
episodes.title: Bone Diggers / The Robot

episodes.synopsis: Garfield and Odie are scared from a horror movie, and they won't let Jon in the house. / A fake secret agent is trying to steal Garfield's friends.
episodes.title: Catnap / Agent X

episodes.synopsis: Squeak and his family have taken up residence in Garfield's house, to Jon's despair. / Garfield's favorite restaurant is in jeopardy.
episodes.title: A Game of Cat and Mouse / Perfect Pizza

episodes.synopsis: Nermal is staying with Garfield for 10 days -- and he's eating all his food. / After a night drying on the clothesline, Pookie has disappeared.
episodes.title: King Nermal / Desperately Seeking Pookie

episodes.synopsis: Garfield is really unhappy about his new diet. / Jon's having trouble sleeping. Dr. Somnambulo's machine, the hypno-doron, might solve his problem.
episodes.title: High Scale / Jon's Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Jon finds an old accordion, and Garfield will do whatever it takes to get rid of it. / Jon has won a live turkey but can't bring himself to eat it.
episodes.title: Not So Sweet Sound of Music / Turkey Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Odie is put in the city pound and Garfield has to get him back. / Odie falls in love with a brush, and a jealous Garfield makes the brush disappear.
episodes.title: Pup in the Pound / Odie in Love

episodes.synopsis: On a new TV show, Jon and Garfield are found to be incompatible. / Odie finds a pot of gold. The owner grants all the wishes Garfield can think of.
episodes.title: Pet Matchers / Lucky Charm

episodes.synopsis: Each time the moon comes out, Odie feels a bit strange, and odd things happen under Jon Arbuckle's roof. / Liz's parents are coming over to meet Jon.
episodes.title: Curse of the Were-Dog / Meet the Parents

episodes.synopsis: Jon and Garfield visit Jon's brother Doc Boy, a farmer in the countryside. / There's a pet show in town, and Garfield has to compete with Nermal.
episodes.title: Down on the Farm / The Pet Show

episodes.synopsis: Liz brings home an old enchanted mirror that opens a door toward ancient Egypt. / Two devilish girls want to plays dolls with Garfield and Odie.
episodes.title: Curse of the Cat People / Glenda & Odessa

episodes.synopsis: Odie explores the underwater world with Garfield. / Jon wants to give Liz a family portrait, but taking the picture will be a grueling experience.
episodes.title: Underwater World / Family Picture

episodes.synopsis: Garfield climbs into an outer space traveler's car, which sends him into parallel worlds. / Garfield finds a watch that can stop time.
episodes.title: Time Twist / Time Master

episodes.synopsis: Liz leaves her pet fish with Jon while she's out of town. Garfield wants to make it his dinner. / A cute little wolf becomes Odie's new friend.
episodes.title: Fish to Fry / Little Yellow Riding Hood

episodes.synopsis: When Sir Leo goes on vacation, Garfield takes his place and becomes a celebrity. / A new invention pulls Garfield into the TV.
episodes.title: Fame Fatale / Virtualodeon

episodes.synopsis: Garfield is stuck in a world where cats take the place of humans. / The postman left his route to Stewart, who hasn't encountered Garfield's traps.
episodes.title: It's a Cat World / Mailman Blues

episodes.synopsis: Jon sends Garfield to Dr. Whipple's show to learn how to be a well-behaved cat. / Jon's cousin passes away and leaves his fortune to Jon and Doc Boy.
episodes.title: Extreme Housebreaking / Heir Apparent

episodes.synopsis: Garfield, Odie and Nermal are competing for the prize of "best Christmas singer." / Garfield changes the recipe of Odie's cake, and it comes to life.
episodes.title: Caroling Capers / From the Oven

episodes.synopsis: Upset with Garfield, Odie befriends a neighbor named Nathan. / Garfield's history of dogs isn't flattering, but he discovers they do have some use.
episodes.title: Neighbor Nathan / History of Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Watching Odie and the squirrels, Garfield sees fun times ahead. / Squeak and his friends beg Garfield to take them to a theme park made of cheese.
episodes.title: Up a Tree / It's a Cheese World

episodes.synopsis: Nermal has demands before giving Pookie back to Garfield. / Garfield gets stuck in a tree, and when everyone tries to help him, they get stuck, too.
episodes.title: Nice to Nermal / Out on a Limb

episodes.synopsis: Garfield tries to convince Nermal superheroes exist by disguising himself as Ultra Powerful Guy. / A helmet allows Garfield to read everyone's minds.
episodes.title: Super Me / Mastermind

episodes.synopsis: Garfield mocks Odie's dreams of being a superhero. / Nermal bets Garfield that if Garfield doesn't eat for an hour, he won't see Nermal for a month.
episodes.title: The Amazing Flying Dog / The Last Word

episodes.synopsis: Garfield accidentally defrosts a caveman. / Al and Pete are fired and replaced by a robot, so Garfield and Odie help them get their jobs back.
episodes.title: Iceman / T3000

episodes.synopsis: Jon wins the lottery! But where is his winning ticket? Garfield, Odie and Jon find it. / Eddie Gourmand wants Jon to illustrate his next book!
episodes.title: Ticket to Riches / Gravity of the Situation

episodes.synopsis: Garfield helps Nermal compete in a beauty contest. / Aunt Ivy is coming to visit! But she hates animals, and Garfield and Odie have to sleep outside.
episodes.title: The Art of Being Uncute / Night of the Bunny Slippers

episodes.synopsis: An asteroid is heading for the planet Earth, and Jon's space ship is the only thing that can destroy it! / Jon is allergic to something, but what?
episodes.title: Blasteroid / The Big Sneeze

episodes.synopsis: Jon goes to great lengths to put Garfield on a strict diet. / Squeak's cousin, Max, doesn't trust cats -- and that includes Garfield.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Fed Me / Meet Max Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Jon, Garfield and Odie go to the country and stay in a house that is haunted! / Jon's two adorable nieces turn out to be Garfield's worst nightmare.
episodes.title: The Haunted House / Which Witch

episodes.synopsis: The postal service invents a new delivery system and tests it at Jon's house. / When Job has a garage sale, Garfield sells Odie to a shady lawyer.
episodes.title: Cyber Mailman / Odie for Sale

episodes.synopsis: Jon expects Garfield to be on his best behavior over the holidays. / Garfield learns that there's more to Christmas than presents and eating!
episodes.title: Home for the Holidays: Part 1 / Home for the Holidays: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The owner of an outer-space fast-food chain plans to turn everybody on Earth into a chicken! / Garfield is attacked by pigeons who want his sandwich.
episodes.title: Planet of Poultry / Honey I Shrunk the Pets

episodes.synopsis: Jon installs a program that allows him to control his appliances by voice. / Jon calls the cable company, but has no luck getting anyone on the line.
episodes.title: Night of Apparatuses / Land of Hold

episodes.synopsis: Garfield resists spending a weekend on the farm with no pizza and no TV. / Eddie is in a foul mood, and he's giving bad reviews to everyone!
episodes.title: Farm Fresh Feline / Inside Eddie Gourmand

episodes.synopsis: Pets are banned from Vito's Pizzeria, thanks to Garfield and his appetite. / Eddie Gourmand is fired from his show and replaced by a healthier host.
episodes.title: With Four You Get Pizza / Guest from Beyond

episodes.synopsis: Garfield discusses the history of cats, going back to the prehistoric ages. / Garfield and Odie's alien friend arrives to stock up on marshmallows.
episodes.title: History of Cats / Dog Days

episodes.synopsis: When Nermal retaliates against Garfield's tricks, Garfield loses his memory! / Giuseppe makes the world's best lasagna, and Garfield wants to try it.
episodes.title: Garfield Astray / Master Chef

episodes.synopsis: Bad luck always follows Jonah, and he brings bad luck to others. One day he crosses paths with Garfield. / Garfield and Odie rescue a baby bird.
episodes.title: Black Cat Blues / The Bluebird of Happiness

episodes.synopsis: Garfield flees to avoid being handled by Minerva and Drusilla, so Jon tells the girls a story. / It's a rainy day, perfect for watching pirate movies.
episodes.title: Penny Henny / Pirate Gold

episodes.synopsis: Garfield is devastated when Jon allows him only one meal for dinner. / Vito's delicious food has turned into something not so delicious.
episodes.title: Great Pizza Race / Love & Lasagna

episodes.synopsis: Garfield used to enjoy cat food, until the day Jon confused Garfield's food with Odie's. / Squeak has developed the power to foresee the future.
episodes.title: Fido Food Feline / Mind over Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Odie is grabbed by something like the giant squid in the movie they've been watching! / Dr. Whipple has a new patient: an elephant named Shrimpy.
episodes.title: A Gripping Tale / Jumbo Shrimpy

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Ivy is having her house fumigated and has to stay at Jon's house. / Bruno takes over the house when Jon goes away on a trip.
episodes.title: Everything's Relative / Stealing Home

episodes.synopsis: The leader of planet Parma has been observing Garfield. / Garfield and Odie meet Prince Orloff, the pampered cat of the wealthy Mrs. Van Gelt.
episodes.title: Cuter Than Cute / Pampered Pussycat

episodes.synopsis: keeps buying useless things on the All-Buying-Stuff Channel. / Packy has a very strange habit: he likes to swap things that don't belong to him!
episodes.title: Depths of a Salesman / Detective Odie

episodes.synopsis: Jon, Garfield and Odie unleash a very bad genie. / Jon receives a very odd package in the mail from his friend Pablo. The package appears to be alive!
episodes.title: Wicked Wishes / Full of Beans

episodes.synopsis: When Garfield sees a news report a cloning device, het gets a not-so-brilliant idea. / Some squirrels have pilfered Garfield's snack.
episodes.title: Me, Garfield and I / The Big Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Goodiegoodie punishes Garfield by turning him black and white. / A mole is digging beneath Jon's yard and ruins their barbecue.
episodes.title: True Colors / The Mole Express

episodes.synopsis: When Jon and Liz go on vacation, Garfield and Odie stay with Aunt Ivy. / Odie is at Doc Boy's, so Jon brings in another pet to keep Garfield company.
episodes.title: Rain or Shine / Parrot Blues

episodes.synopsis: Jon brings Drusilla and Minerva camping on a very hot day. / Some strange weather is happening -- and it all seems to be coming from a single cloud.
episodes.title: Unfair Weather: Part 1 / Unfair Weather: Part 2
